Description
Admin
 
AdminUserAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for the admin profiles list (User/Organizer/Admin).
AdminUserAdapter.OnRemoveClick
Callback invoked when the inline remove/demote control is tapped.
AdminUserAdapter.OnUserClick
Callback invoked when a user row is tapped (open detail).
AdminUserAdapter.UserRow
Lightweight row model mapped from /users (id, name, email, role, avatarUrl).
AEventDetailFrag
Admin Event Detail screen that reuses the user-facing event detail layout but replaces the primary action with an administrative “Remove” button that navigates to the Remove Options screen.

Admin Home fragment that lists events and routes to administrative actions.

This is the base Application class.

DeviceLoginStore
Persists the last user who signed in on this device so we can restore their session without prompting for credentials again.
EntrantLocation
 
Event
 
EventRepository
EventRepository defines the contract for managing event-related operations within the application’s data layer.
ExportHelper
This is a class that is responsible for exporting a list of names as a CSV file to then devices storage.
FirebaseEventRepository
This class is meant to handle any operations that will happen to the events in Firebase Methods in this class: joinWaitlist(...) - Allows users to join the waitlist of an event

This class holds methods that upload images to Cloudinary storage.
ImageRepository.UploadCallback
 
ImageSource
 
LogEntry
 
LoginFrag
This class handles user authentication using Firebase Auth.
LogRepository
 
MainActivity
This class is the main entry point of the application This class is responsible for managing navigation across all fragments of the application.
NotificationList
This is a model for the NotificationList in Firestore Fields of notificationList document: - eventId: String - all: List This is a list of all users for notification purposes *Could possibly be changed* - cancelled: List This is a list of all users who chose not to accept the invitation from an event - invited: List This is a list of all users who are chosen by the lottery to sign up for an event - finalList: List This is a list of all users who have accepted the invitation to the event.
OCreateEventFrag
This class is for users to be able to create new events when they are in their organizer state.
OCreateFrag
This class provides the UI for organizers to be able to create an event.
OEditEventFrag
Organizer edit event screen.
OEntrantMapFrag
Entrant Map Screen.
OEventDetailFrag
This class if for displaying the detailed information about an event for a user, when they select an event from the OHomeFrag.
OEventListAdapter
Adapter class for displaying a list of participant names (either from the waiting list or final list) in the organizer event screen.
OEventListAdapter.OnItemLongClickListener
This interface is a listener for a long-press action on the names in the list
OEventListFrag
Fragment that allows an event organizer to view and manage participants on both the waiting list and final list for a specific event.
OHomeController
Controller for the organizer home screen.
OHomeFrag
Organizer home view that delegates data and filtering to the controller/model.
OHomeModel
Model for organizer home screen event data.
OHomeView
View contract for the organizer home screen.
ONotiFrag
This class is responsible for managing organizer notifications and certain event actions.
OProfileFrag
This class is for the organizers profile screen.
ProfileController
 
ProfileModel
Model class for user profile operations using Firebase Firestore and Authentication.
ProfileModel.DataCallback<T>
Callback interface for asynchronous data operations.
ProfileView
 
RegisterFrag
This activity is responsible for registering new users.
ServiceLocator
This class is for getting single instances of a service for the application.

UEventDetailFrag
Displays event details for entrants, allows joining the waitlist, and captures optional geolocation.

Controller for the user home screen.

UNotiAdapter.OnOptionClickListener
 
UNotiFrag
Fragment responsible for displaying a list of notifications for the currently logged-in user.
UNotiItem
This class represents a single user notification that is retrieved from the Firestore
UPastEventItem
Fragment that allows users to see past event items.
UPastEventsAdapter
Adapter for Past Events screen
UPastEventsFrag
Fragment that displays a list of past events for the currently logged-in user.
UProfileFrag
Fragment that displays the user profile screen.
UScanFrag
This class deals with scanning a QR code and identifying which event to navigate to.
User
 
UserEvent
This class represents the UserEvents that get retrieved from Firestore that users can join and create.
UserEventAdapter
This class handles displaying the events properly in the view on the homepage Events are formatted and provide navigation functionality to a specified events detail view.
UserEventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
 
UserRepository
Repository interface for user profile related operations.
UserSession
Singleton class to manage the current user session This holds the logged-in user throughout the app lifecycle

This class is the entry point of our App flow.
